name: E. Road to Home
statement:
Once Danil the student was returning home from tram stop lately by
straight road of length . The stop is located at the point , but the
Danil’s home at the point . Danil goes from to with a constant speed and
does not change direction of movement.There are street lights at the
road, each of which lights some continuous segment of the road. All of
the lightened segments do not share common points.Danil loves to sing,
thus he wants to sing his favourite song over and over again during his
walk. As soon as non-lightened segments of the road scare him, he sings
only when he goes through the lightened segments.Danil passes distance
while performing his favourite song once. Danil can’t start another
performance if the segment passed while performing is not fully
lightened. Moreover, if Danil has taken a pause between two
performances, he is not performing while not having passed a segment of
length at least . Formally, Danil can start single performance at a
point only if every point of segment is lightened; If Danil has finished
performing at a point , then the next performance can be started only at
a point such that or satisfying the statement under the point .
Determine how many times Danil can perform his favourite song during his
walk from to .Please note that Danil does not break a single
performance, thus, started singing another time, he finishes singing
when having a segment of length of passed from the performance start
point.
